january.name: Martin Luther King Jr.
january.desc: Civil Rights Activist, Minister, Born In: Atlanta, Georgia, United States

january.name: Muhammad Ali
january.desc: Greatest Heavyweight Boxer of All Time. One of the most recognized sports figures of the past 100 years, Muhammad Ali created ripples in the arena of professional boxing at the tender age of 22, by knocking out the then heavyweight champion Sonny Liston.

january.name: Nicolas Cage
january.desc: Actor, Producer Nicolas Cage is one of the most famous actors in Hollywood. Be it for his versatility or the discovery of the new acting process called method acting, Cage is currently one of Hollywood’s most talented actors.

february.name: Shakira
february.desc: Born In: Barranquilla, Colombia.Shakira is a highly successful Columbian pop artist, best known for her scintillating belly dance moves in the video of the song ‘Hips Don’t Lie.’ She has sold over 70 million albums worldwide.

march.name: Justin Bieber
march.desc: Born In: London, Canada.Justin Bieber is a Canadian singer and songwriter who was taken the music world by storm. Releasing his first album at the age of 15, he has gone on to become one of the most talked about artists in recent times, both for good and bad reasons.

march.name: Mikhail Gorbachev
march.desc: Born In: Privol'noe, Russia. President of the Soviet Union (1990-91).A great statesman and an outstanding leader, Mikhail Gorbachev played a quintessential role in terminating the ‘Cold War.’

march.name: Lily Collins
march.desc: Born In: Guildford, England.Lily Collins is a popular British-American actress and model. A graduate from the ‘University of Southern California,’ the star has been in the acting and modeling world since the age of two, thanks to her famous musician father, Phil Collins.

april.name: Queen Elizabeth II
april.desc: Queen of the United Kingdom.Elizabeth II is the queen of the UK and the other Commonwealth realms. Over the years, she has been revered by her subjects for her administrative acumen and unequivocal empathy towards all factions of the society.

april.name: Adolf Hitler
april.desc: Born In: Braunau Am Inn, Austria.Dictator of Germany (1933-1945)

april.name: Emma Watson
april.desc: Born In: Paris, France.Emma Watson is a British actress and model who reprised the role of the know-it-all, cherubic, side-kick, ‘Hermione Granger’ in the Harry Potter film franchise. When she committed to the Harry Potter series, little did she know that her life would change forever.

may.name: John F. Kennedy
may.desc: Born In: Brookline, Massachusetts, United States.A quote by Kennedy, ‘Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men’, perfectly summarizes his philosophy of life. A man with a futuristic vision, John Fitzgerald Kennedy served as the 35th President of the United States. A quote by Kennedy, ‘Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men’, perfectly summarizes his philosophy of life. A man with a futuristic vision, John Fitzgerald Kennedy served as the 35th President of the United States.

may.name: Megan Fox
may.desc: Born In: Oak Ridge, Tennessee, United States.Megan Fox is an American actor and model. At the tender age of five, she enrolled for dance and drama classes.

may.name: Dwayne Johnson
may.desc: Born In: Hayward, California, United States.Dwayne Johnson is a professional wrestler turned actor known for his appearance in the fantasy adventure film, ‘The Mummy Returns’. A highly successful professional wrestler before making his foray into films, Johnson is also famous by his ring name, ‘The Rock’.

june.name: Elon Musk
june.desc: Elon Musk is one of the greatest and most prolific modern inventors and is responsible for monumental advancements in futuristic technology like renewable energy and space travel. Many of his innovations seem to be right out of a science-fiction movie, but throughout his career he has brought about huge scientific breakthroughs. After making his first fortune from the internet payment service ‘PayPal’, he invested $100 million in his space travel company, ‘SpaceX’ and began building satellites, launch vehicles and other spacecraft both for NASA and for his own company, creating new milestones with his privately funded spacecraft.

june.name: Donald Trump
june.desc: 45th President of the United States  from 2017 to 2021. Before his presidential stint, he was a successful business magnate and television personality.

june.name: Angelina Jolie
june.desc: Hollywood's Highest-Paid Actress In Her Hey Days
